text: is a Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Oshima was born in Shizuoka on January 23, 1993. After graduating from Shizuoka Gakuen High School, he joined J1 League club Kawasaki Frontale in 2011. He played many matches as central midfielder from 2012. In 2017, Kawasaki won the J1 League champions first time in the club history. Kawasaki also won the J1 champions in 2018 and 2020. In 2016, Oshima played for the Japan U-23 national team at 2016 AFC U-23 Championship. Japan won the champions and qualified for the 2016 Summer Olympics. At 2016 Summer Olympics, he played all 3 matches as central midfielder. On September 1, 2016, he debuted for the Japan national team against United Arab Emirates at 2018 World Cup. In 2018, he participated 2018 World Cup, but he did not play in the match.
